attributes.action: Allow more competition in the postal service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Royal Mail have been around for many years, and are inefficiant in both cost and delivery times. Its about time to give freedom of choice to the people which will inevitably send prices down and the quality and speed of the service up.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
